On September 20, 2025 Fred was invited to give an lightning talk on our work on crash data analysis at the first ever [Neighborhood Week](https://www.moreneighborsa2.org/neighborhoodweek) in Ann Arbor, MI. 
The talk was titled "Who Killed Whom - Counterparties in Road Traffic Crashes and the Implications on Transportation Justice".
You can watch the video recording of the talk below.
